verses.verse: וַתִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> vat-tis-Sa lifted me up אֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti ר֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach, Moreover the spirit וַתָּבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Ve and brought אֹ֠תִי <S%H853><s%> 'O-ti אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- house יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD'S הַקַּדְמוֹנִי֙ <S%H6931><s%> hak-kad-mo-Ni me unto the east הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> hap-po-Neh which looketh קָדִ֔ימָה <S%H6921><s%> ka-Di-mah, eastward וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold בְּפֶ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> be-Fe-tach and behold at the door הַשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar, of the gate עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim and twenty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-mish-Shah five אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; men וָאֶרְאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh whom I saw בְתוֹכָ֜ם <S%H8432><s%> ve-to-Cham among אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַאֲזַנְיָ֧ה <S%H2970><s%> ya-'a-zan-Yah Jaazaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son עַזֻּ֛ר <S%H5809><s%> 'az-Zur of Azur וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פְּלַטְיָ֥הוּ <S%H6410><s%> pe-lat-Ya-hu and Pelatiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son בְּנָיָ֖הוּ <S%H1141><s%> be-na-Ya-hu of Benaiah שָׂרֵ֖י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei princes הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. of the people פ Peh

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- he unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these הָאֲנָשִׁ֞ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim are the men הַחֹשְׁבִ֥ים <S%H2803><s%> ha-cho-she-Vim that devise אָ֛וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven mischief וְהַיֹּעֲצִ֥ים <S%H3289><s%> ve-hai-yo-'a-Tzim and give עֲצַת־ <S%H6098><s%> 'a-tzat- counsel רָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ra' wicked בָּעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir in this city הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot. who

הָאֹ֣מְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> ha-'O-me-Rim, Which say לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo is not בְקָר֖וֹב <S%H7138><s%> ve-ka-Rov [It is] not near בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> be-Not let us build בָּתִּ֑ים <S%H1004><s%> bat-Tim; houses הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he הַסִּ֔יר <S%H5518><s%> has-Sir, this [city is] the caldron וַאֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu we הַבָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> hab-ba-Sar. and we [be] the flesh

לָכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve Therefore prophesy עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem; against הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve against them prophesy בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- O son אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. of man

וַתִּפֹּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> vat-tip-Pol fell עָלַי֮ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai Then ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach And the Spirit יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer upon me and said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me אֱמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor unto me Speak כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> 'a-mar-Tem Thus have ye said בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וּמַעֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> u-ma-'a-Lot the things that come רֽוּחֲכֶ֖ם <S%H7307><s%> ru-cha-Chem into your mind אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְדַעְתִּֽיהָ׃ <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Ti-ha. for I know

הִרְבֵּיתֶ֥ם <S%H7235><s%> hir-bei-Tem Ye have multiplied חַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H2491><s%> chal-lei-Chem your slain בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir in this city הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot; likewise וּמִלֵּאתֶ֥ם <S%H4390><s%> u-mil-le-Tem and ye have filled חוּצֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H2351><s%> chu-tzo-Tei-ha the streets חָלָֽל׃ <S%H2491><s%> cha-Lal. thereof with the slain פ Peh

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD חַלְלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H2491><s%> chal-lei-Chem Your slain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom שַׂמְתֶּ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> sam-Tem whom ye have laid בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Chah, in the midst הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah of the city הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> hab-ba-Sar of it they [are] the flesh וְהִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi and this הַסִּ֑יר <S%H5518><s%> has-Sir; and this [city is] the caldron וְאֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> ve-'et-Chem הוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tzi but I will bring you forth מִתּוֹכָֽהּ׃ <S%H8432><s%> mit-to-Chah. out of the midst

חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev the sword יְרֵאתֶ֑ם <S%H3372><s%> ye-re-Tem; Ye have feared וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> ve-Che-rev a sword אָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> 'a-Vi and I will bring עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem, and נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um upon you saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. GOD

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tze-Ti And I will bring you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִתּוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> mit-to-Chah, of the midst וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti thereof and deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- you into the hands זָרִ֑ים <S%H2114><s%> za-Rim; of strangers וְעָשִׂ֛יתִי <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ti and will execute בָכֶ֖ם va-Chem שְׁפָטִֽים׃ <S%H8201><s%> she-fa-Tim. judgments

בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword תִּפֹּ֔לוּ <S%H5307><s%> tip-Po-lu, Ye shall fall עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul you in the border יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶשְׁפּ֣וֹט <S%H8199><s%> esh-Pot I will judge אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem; וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

הִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> Hi, This לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become לָכֶם֙ la-Chem לְסִ֔יר <S%H5518><s%> le-Sir, This [city] shall not be your caldron וְאַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you תִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yu become בְתוֹכָ֖הּ <S%H8432><s%> ve-to-Chah in the midst לְבָשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> le-va-Sar; neither shall ye be the flesh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul you in the border יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> 'esh-Pot thereof [but] I will judge אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem.

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, that I [am] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher my בְּחֻקַּי֙ <S%H2706><s%> be-chuk-Kai in my statutes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <S%H1980><s%> ha-lach-Tem, for ye have not walked וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-pa-Tai my judgments לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tem; neither executed וּֽכְמִשְׁפְּטֵ֧י <S%H4941><s%> u-che-mish-pe-Tei after the manners הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim of the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-tei-Chem that [are] round about עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tem. but have done

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came כְּהִנָּ֣בְאִ֔י <S%H5012><s%> ke-hin-Na-ve-'I, And it came to pass when I prophesied וּפְלַטְיָ֥הוּ <S%H6410><s%> u-fe-lat-Ya-hu that Pelatiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son בְּנָיָ֖ה <S%H1141><s%> be-na-Yah of Benaiah מֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> Met; died וָאֶפֹּ֨ל <S%H5307><s%> va-'ep-Pol Then fell I down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פָּנַ֜י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai upon my face וָאֶזְעַ֣ק <S%H2199><s%> va-'ez-'Ak and cried קוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> kol- voice גָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, with a loud וָאֹמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar and said אֲהָהּ֙ <S%H162><s%> 'a-Hah Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD כָּלָה֙ <S%H3617><s%> ka-Lah a full end אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah will You עֹשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh, wilt thou make אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit of the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man אַחֶ֤יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-cha thy brethren אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-cha [even] thy brethren אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> 'an-Shei the men גְאֻלָּתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1353><s%> ge-'ul-la-Te-cha, of thy kindred וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and the whole בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כֻּלֹּ֑ה <S%H3605><s%> kul-Loh; all אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom אָמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru have said לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei wholly [are] they unto whom the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem רַֽחֲקוּ֙ <S%H7368><s%> ra-cha-Ku Get you far מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, from the LORD לָ֥נוּ <S%H99999><s%> La-nu הִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> hi this נִתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> nit-te-Nah given הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz unto us is this land לְמוֹרָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H4181><s%> le-mo-ra-Shah. in possession ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore אֱמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor, Therefore say כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Though הִרְחַקְתִּים֙ <S%H7368><s%> hir-chak-Tim Although I have cast them far off בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim, among the heathen וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi and though הֲפִֽיצוֹתִ֖ים <S%H6327><s%> ha-fi-tzo-Tim and although I have scattered בָּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> ba-'a-ra-Tzot; them among the countries וָאֱהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> va-'e-Hi become לָהֶם֙ la-Hem לְמִקְדָּ֣שׁ <S%H4720><s%> le-mik-Dash sanctuary מְעַ֔ט <S%H4592><s%> me-'At, yet will I be to them as a little בָּאֲרָצ֖וֹת <S%H776><s%> ba-'a-ra-Tzot in the countries אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- where בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u where they shall come שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. in it ס sa-Mek
